articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25 Plus, S25 Ultra launched with Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, AI upgrades. Check India price, features
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models. These phones feature the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, AI enhancements through One UI 7, and advanced camera systems, with the Ultra model boasting a 200MP primary sensor. Global availability begins on February 7, 2025.

articles.title: The unconventional playground item you need in your nappy bag
articles.author: Lauren Robinsonw
articles.summary: Legacee Bags is promoting a novel use for a shower squeegee as a solution for drying wet playground equipment. This suggestion, shared on their social media platforms, aims to help parents and caregivers quickly prepare outdoor play areas for children, eliminating the need for wet towels and reducing laundry.

articles.title: Samsung unveils new AI-powered smartphone in fight against Apple
articles.author: Michael Acton
articles.summary: Samsung is launching a new Galaxy Watch in the UK. The launch is intended to compete with Apple in the smartwatch market.

articles.title: 2025 Xpeng G6 Long Range review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: Xpeng has launched the G6, a mid-sized electric SUV, in Australia. Two rear-wheel drive versions are available, priced competitively against rivals like Tesla Model Y. The G6 features a tech-focused interior, updatable software, and generous standard equipment including a 14.9-inch touchscreen, wireless phone chargers, and advanced safety features.

articles.title: Just $1! This universally-flattering lipstick 'looks and wears like a high-end' product
articles.author: Rebecca Carhart
articles.summary: Wet n Wild launched its Silk Finish Lipstick, available for $1 on Amazon. The lipstick, particularly the Dark Pink Frost shade, is praised for its universally flattering color, hydrating formula infused with vitamins and oils, and cruelty-free status. Customer reviews highlight the product's high quality and smooth consistency, comparable to more expensive brands.

articles.title: Investall Unveils AskNewt - a Revolutionary AI Agent with Unmatched Accuracy, Intelligence, and Relevance
articles.author: Investall
articles.summary: AskNewt, a cutting-edge AI agent, is launching and transforming how people search, access, and interact with information. AskNewt provides real-time insights across finance, news, dining, fashion, and travel, offering unmatched speed, accuracy, and context for dynamic decision-making.

articles.title: What is Agentic AI, and why is it such a big deal on the Galaxy S25?
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: Samsung and Google introduced Agentic AI during the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 presentation, highlighting its integration into the Galaxy S25 phones. This new AI leverages a Snapdragon chip with a powerful NPU and a knowledge graph to analyze user data and automate tasks, enhancing the capabilities of Galaxy AI to provide more personalized and proactive assistance.

articles.title: I Need Tech Bros to Stop Using the Sparkles Emoji for AI
articles.author: Katelyn Chedraoui
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the new Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra at its Unpacked event. These new phones feature Samsung's Galaxy AI.

articles.title: 'Classy, yet futuristic': See the first AI-designed, 3D printed shoe available to buy
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Syntilay, in partnership with Joe Foster, is launching the first commercially available AI-designed, fully 3D-printed shoe, a slider inspired by yachts and spaceships, launching on January 22. The shoe's design was significantly influenced by AI, and it will be customized to the consumer's foot via a smartphone scanning program and 3D printed in Germany, costing $149.99 and available in five colors on the company's website.

articles.title: NIO EL6 - the evolution of luxury
articles.author: IN COLLABORATION WITH NIO
articles.summary: NIO has launched the EL6, a compact SUV that redefines luxury with minimalist design, eco-friendly materials, and advanced technology. It features a 12.8-inch AMOLED screen, a 23-speaker sound system, and the NIO AQUILA sensor suite for safety and autonomous driving. The EL6 offers an option between two batteries (75 and 100 kWh) and a maximum range of up to 529 km. Customers also enjoy open invitations to NIO's lifestyle centers, with workspaces and even local cocktails.

articles.title: Avid Collective calls for industry standardisation of branded content
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: Avid Collective urges the industry to standardize branded content practices following the launch of Avid PubSuite last year, an end-to-end platform designed for branded content campaigns. The company aims to clarify the definition of branded content and differentiate it from other forms of advertising to drive growth and improve accessibility.

articles.title: Square celebrates human connection in ‘Service Still Matters' platform, via Sunday Gravy campaign
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Square launched 'Service Still Matters,' a new brand platform that focuses on the importance of human interaction in customer service. The platform showcases hospitality business owners providing exceptional service and is being launched in Australia via various media channels, including TV, cinema, and digital platforms, targeting customers and business owners.

articles.title: Tidalove Solid Serum: A Revolution in Hydration with Advanced K-Beauty Technology and Natural Ingredients
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Tidalove launched Tidalove Solid Serum, a skincare innovation combining Korean beauty technology and natural ingredients. The serum provides effective hydration and enhances the long-term health of the skin.

articles.title: Samsung's VR Headset Looks a Lot Like Apple Vision Pro
articles.author: archyde

The headset is designed for user comfort, features seamless integration with Google's Gemini AI, and aims to offer an intuitive and immersive AR/VR experience. Apple is also expected to launch new products like AirTag 2 and Powerbeats Pro 2.

articles.title: Samsung's Surprise Galaxy S25 Edge Beats iPhone 17 Air

articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge at its Unpacked event on January 22nd in San Jose, California. The new smartphone is noted for its super-thin design, dual rear cameras, and silver color option. The S25 Edge is expected to be released this year.

articles.title: Fonterra's innovation drives success with new cream product in China

This product targets the growing mass mid-tier segment of the Chinese market, representing approximately 40% of the UHT market. Developed by Fonterra's Research and Development Centre, the product went from idea to commercial production in less than a year.

articles.title: Advertising makes good better, but it won't fix bad
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: Lexlab leveraged targeted broad reach channels and paid influencers to supercharge the visibility of Chupa Chups' "Incredible Chews" range. The result was a spike in engagement and sales, demonstrating that the right product, combined with the right amplification strategy, yields positive results.

articles.title: Aldi is selling a £4.99 gadget that Mrs Hinch loves and it helps get rid of mould easily
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: ALDI is launching the Ambiano Electric Scrubber, a budget-friendly cleaning gadget priced at £4.99. The scrubber features four interchangeable heads and is available in three colors as part of Aldi's Specialbuys range.

articles.title: Aldi is selling a £4.99 gadget that Mrs Hinch loves and it helps get rid of mould easily
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: ALDI is launching the Ambiano Electric Scrubber for £4.99 as part of its Specialbuys range. The scrubber, comparable to the SonicScrubber, features interchangeable heads and is available in three colours. It offers a budget-friendly alternative for tackling tough cleaning jobs.

The drops were initially available online and quickly sold out, with additional quantities released later in January. Each can contains 20 individually wrapped drops and comes with a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup.

articles.title: Samsung aims to turn its next generation of Galaxy smartphones into AI companions

The standard model starts at $800, and the phones are scheduled to be in stores starting February 7.

articles.title: Samsung unveils Galaxy S25 Series: Enhanced cameras, AI capabilities and more

articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy S25 series, a new line of flagship smartphones featuring enhanced cameras, performance improvements, and a next-generation AI platform called One UI 7 with Personal Data Engine. The S25 series is available for preorder now, with devices arriving in buyers' hands beginning February 7, with prices starting at $799.99 for the S25, $999.99 for the S25+, and $1,299.99 for the S25 Ultra.

The Dyson WashG1 includes features like self-propulsion, LCD screen, and separate tanks for clean and dirty water. The review highlights the product's cleaning performance, battery life, and maintenance process, offering insights for potential customers.

The S25 Edge will be priced below the S25 Ultra.

Preorders for the Samsung Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+ and Galaxy S25 Ultra are already open, and they will ship on February 7.

articles.title: iGaming Platform: Why Software and Regulations Matter

NuxGame solutions are customized to meet various business goals, from comprehensive casino setups to betting software tailored to specific regional needs.

articles.title: Samsung turning its next-gen Galaxy smartphones into AI companions

Samsung also plans to launch an ultrathin version, the Galaxy S25 Edge.

The Samsung S25 phones will go on general sale on February 7, 2025, and will retail starting at £859.

The S25 series will be available in the Philippines starting Feb. 14, with pre-orders from Jan. 23 to Feb. 13.

The S25 Ultra features a curvy design with a durable titanium body and Corning Gorilla Armor 2, along with increased use of recycled materials and six months of Gemini Advanced and 2TB of cloud storage.

Sky Mobile is offering these models with contracts starting from £30 per month, including promotional offers like free Galaxy Buds3 Pro and double storage at no extra cost. The Galaxy S25 series features an 'ultra-fast' processor, bright display, 'super-smart' AI software, and stylish new colors.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 series is here, though you'll be hard-pressed to tell the difference

The Galaxy S25 Ultra is available in Titanium colors, while the S25 and S25+ offer Silver Shadow, Navy, Icy Blue and Mint.

The device boasts a larger display, upgraded cameras including a 50-megapixel ultrawide lens, and is powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, with improved CPU, GPU and NPU performance. Also new is an Audio Eraser feature for video noise reduction.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: How To Watch and What You Can Expect
articles.author: Poulami Saha
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its new Galaxy S25 series (S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra) at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event. These phones are expected to feature improved Galaxy AI and new color options. Also, the launch might include the Galaxy Ring wearable and a detailed look at Project Moohan, an extended reality headset developed with Google.

articles.title: Nissan e-Trail trademark points to plug-in X-Trail
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Nissan might use the 'e-Trail' name for a future version of the Rogue vehicle. This version is yet to go on sale in the US market, indicating a potential new product offering from Nissan.

articles.title: Here's what Bambu will — and won't — promise after its controversial 3D printer update
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Bambu Lab introduced a new proprietary authentication mechanism, "Bambu Connect" desktop app, for its 3D printers to secure them against remote hacks. This update aims to control access to critical operations, potentially limiting the use of third-party tools. A "Developer Mode" will also be offered for at-your-own-risk use.

articles.title: How to Watch Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Live Online
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on January 22nd.  The new series will feature the advanced processor and enhanced camera systems, improved battery life, and innovative display technologies. Samsung is also introducing Bixby 5.0, a new AI system, designed to be an intuitive and personalized companion.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Event Unveils Today: When And How To Watch Live, Expected S25 Ultra Specs & More
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra, at the Unpacked 2025 event along with Project Moohan, a new XR headset. The S25 series will feature AI-powered smartphones with revamped Sketch to Image tool with prices ranging from Rs 84,999 to Rs 1,64,999 depending on the model and storage. Pre-reservations are open in India with exclusive launch offers.

articles.title: I Went Hands-On With NymVPN, a New Kind of Secure Network
articles.author: Fergus O'Sullivan
articles.summary: Nym is introducing NymVPN, a new decentralized network designed to enhance privacy as a potential VPN alternative. NymVPN uses a mixnet feature with asynchronous routing and randomized data to obfuscate data. Volunteers operating Nym nodes are rewarded with tokens.

articles.title: The "Boring" Switch 2 Is Actually On-brand for Nintendo Home Consoles
articles.author: Sydney Butler
articles.summary: The upcoming Nintendo Switch 2 is perceived as a refined version of the existing Nintendo Switch, focusing on being a bigger, better, and modern take. While some express disappointment at the lack of a significant "gimmick," it aligns with Nintendo's established strategy of straightforward console upgrades. The Switch 2 is considered by some as Switch "Pro".

articles.title: A Beginner's Guide to Buying a Home Projector
articles.author: Sydney Butler
articles.summary: Samsung offers 'The Freestyle', a lightweight, optionally battery-powered projector suitable for portable use. This positions it as a convenient alternative to heavier, permanently installed projectors.

articles.title: How Meta Tried to Lure TikTok Users to Instagram
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Instagram and Facebook introduced a set of new features. They promoted these platforms as TikTok alternatives.

articles.title: Render, which offers developers cloud services for building, deploying, and running apps and websites, raised an $80M Series C led by Georgian (Mike Wheatley/SiliconANGLE)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: Render Services Inc., a developer-focused cloud infrastructure startup, raised an $80M Series C led by Georgian. Render provides cloud services for developers to build, deploy, and run apps and websites. The company aims to disrupt traditional giants such as Amazon Web Services Inc.

articles.title: From K-Dramas to Manila: EGGDROP Lands with a Sizzle in the Philippines
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: EGGDROP launched its first store in the Philippines in December 2024, introducing its premium egg sandwiches to Filipino customers. The sandwiches feature brioche buns made with a Korean recipe and locally sourced organic eggs, blending Korean and Filipino influences.

articles.title: Buy dmt carts online usa
articles.author: dmt2035
articles.summary: Mushroom Vapes introduces a new line of vaping products featuring DMT extracts, mushroom vapes, mushroom chocolates, and LSD products. These products are designed to provide a unique and immersive vaping experience.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland's Supersonic Hair Dryer Dupe Has Shoppers Rushing to Stores
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Visage Iconic Hairdryer on January 26th, a budget-friendly alternative to the Dyson Supersonic, priced at €16.99. The hairdryer features three heat settings, two-speed settings, an Ionic function, and comes with a concentrator, diffuser, and safety features, available in three trendy colors.

articles.title: From K-Dramas to Manila: EGGDROP Lands with a Sizzle in the Philippines
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: EGGDROP, a Korean egg sandwich brand, launched its first Philippine store at SM Mall of Asia in Manila. The opening of the store signifies the introduction of EGGDROP's services to a new market.

articles.title: Dress Weights, Sneaker-Cleaning Sponges, And 26 More Things That'll Help Solve Your Fashion Problems WIthout Getting A New Wardrobe
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article features several new product recommendations focused on revitalizing and extending the life of existing items.  Products include fabric shavers for clothing, stain removers for leather and other materials, shoe stretch sprays, cleaning pastes, fabric dyes and various repair kits. These products aim to offer cost-effective alternatives to replacing worn or damaged items, promoting sustainability and resourcefulness.

articles.title: New eCommerce platform to connect buyers, sellers
articles.author: Elizabeth Adeleye
articles.summary: MarketBuddy, an electronic commerce web application platform, has launched in Nigeria. The platform provides services including the sale of goods/items, services from vendors, and an auction module. About 3000 artisans have been onboarded to the platform, with approximately 15,000 goods available.

articles.title: Panasonic 3-Blade Wet & Dry Compact Electric Shaver full review
articles.author: Troy Nankervis
articles.summary: Panasonic launched the Compact 3 Blade High Speed Shaver, a portable and waterproof electric shaver. It features Japanese stainless steel blades, USB-C charging, and a two-year manufacturer's warranty. The shaver is designed for travel and offers a close shave with up to 45 minutes of use on a full charge.

articles.title: GeForce Now game streaming is sold out for many
articles.author: Michael Crider
articles.summary: Nvidia's GeForce Now service is experiencing high demand, leading to sold-out subscriptions for most options, including new free accounts, day passes, and one-month passes. However, one-month and six-month passes for the Ultimate tier are still available.

articles.title: New Trussville car wash opening in February
articles.author: Isaac Goffin
articles.summary: New Day Car Wash will open a new location in Trussville in February, with a ribbon-cutting ceremony scheduled for February 21st. This environmentally conscious car wash business is headquartered in Birmingham and opened its first location in Vestavia Hills last year.

articles.title: Perplexity launches Sonar API, taking aim at Google and OpenAI with real-time AI search
articles.summary: Perplexity has launched Sonar, a new AI search service, aimed at enterprises needing real-time information. Sonar distinguishes itself through its real-time web connection, offering current data that differs from traditional training data-reliant APIs. The launch is strategically timed amidst Perplexity's market momentum and presents a new option for technical decision-makers.

articles.title: Chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy sells out at launch: ‘Soup you can suck on'
articles.summary: Progresso, a brand of General Mills, launched a new product called "Soup Drops," a hard-candy version of its chicken noodle soup, intended as a comfort during cold and flu season. The first batch of Soup Drops quickly sold out upon release and will be restocked on the company website for $2.49 plus shipping, with the 20-pack being packaged in a can resembling the iconic Progresso Soup can.

articles.title: 35 Problem-Solving Products If You're In Need Of Some Solutions
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article highlights several new and noteworthy cleaning and beauty products. It introduces wool dryer balls as a reusable alternative to dryer sheets, a flossing toothbrush for a deeper clean, and The Pink Stuff for tackling tough messes. The article also mentions Maple Holistics's biotin shampoo for thickening hair, Venus Visage teeth whitening pen, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Bioclean hard-water stain remover, and Mielle Rosemary Mint strengthening oil.

articles.title: What to expect as China's local authorities plan for 2025 economy--China Economic Net
articles.author: Fu Bo
articles.summary: Several Chinese regions, including Shanghai and Guangdong, are focusing on developing their "debut economy" to stimulate consumption and encourage industrial innovation. This includes initiatives to attract companies to launch new products, introduce new business models and services, and open flagship stores, with cities like Guangzhou offering cash rewards and streamlined approval processes to facilitate these launches. The efforts include trade-in programs for consumer goods like mobile phones and home appliances.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 today: When and where to watch? Other details
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its Galaxy S25 series, including the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25 Ultra, at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22. The launch will showcase new devices with updated specs and features.

articles.title: Eufy's Super Thin Robot Vacuum Is Down to Its Lowest Price, Cheaper Than My Small ...
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Eufy is promoting the Robot Vacuum 11S MAX. The vacuum features a thin design and is available at a low price.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 offers personalized AI assistant
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics' Mobile Experience division introduced the Galaxy S25 series at an event in San Jose. Following the launch of their first AI-powered smartphone, Samsung is focusing on innovating in the mobile AI market.

articles.title: Sky Mobile confirms Samsung Galaxy S25 stock and prices with major deal for shoppers
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its new Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra smartphones. The launch occurred at the annual Galaxy Unpacked event in California.

articles.title: Petalfast Partners With Platinum Vapes to Expand Nationwide Growth and Distribution
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Petalfast, a cannabis sales and distribution platform, has partnered with Platinum Vape. Platinum Vape delivers high potency cannabis products. This partnership could indicate the introduction or expansion of Platinum Vape's products through Petalfast's distribution network.

articles.title: YouthSpark Complaints: Can This Supplement Really Boost Cellular Health?
articles.author: Belleview Reporter
articles.summary: Nature's Blast YouthSpark, a new revolutionary powder formula, is introduced to revitalize bodies at a cellular level. The product is designed to combat aging, enhance energy levels, and support overall well-being.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms Pre-Order Special Offers For Galaxy S25 Ultra
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung will offer special deals for customers who pre-order the Galaxy S25 Ultra. This pertains to Samsung's new flagship smartphone launch.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer's �35 quilted jacket will keep you 'as warm as it does dry' ...
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: M&S utilizes innovative Thermowarmth technology to provide warmth. Additionally, M&S incorporates Stormwear water-repellent technology for protection from light rain.

articles.title: "Eat Dessert First" in 2025 with New Flavors and Products from the Unilever Ice Cream Portfolio
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Breyers, Talenti, Good Humor, Popsicle, Magnum, and Klondike, all Unilever brands, will introduce new ice cream flavors in 2025. These brands plan to release additional products throughout the year. These brands expect to create enjoyable experiences for their customers.

articles.title: Popular social media app unveils innovation to bank from TikTok ban
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A social media platform created a new app. The app was created on the day of the TikTok ban.

articles.title: Where can I buy the Nintendo Switch 2?
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the Nintendo Switch 2 this year. Fans are anticipating getting the latest model.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy S25 with Qualcomm chips and AI features
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics introduced the Samsung Galaxy S25 smartphone line. These phones are powered by Qualcomm's chips and Google's AI model, offering upgraded AI features. The company anticipates these features will boost sales and compete with Apple and Chinese rivals.

articles.title: Luxardo Del Santo Makes U.S. Debut
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Luxardo, the Italian liqueur producer, has introduced Del Santo Herbal Liqueur to the U.S. market. This new offering aims to capitalize on the growing consumer interest in premium spirits and liqueurs in America.

articles.title: Progresso Soup Drops sell out soup-er fast: When more of the hard candy will drop
articles.author: Caller Times
articles.summary: Progresso released 'Soup Drops,' a chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy, for a limited time during flu and cold season. This innovative product offers soup lovers a new way to enjoy their favorite flavor.

articles.title: China's automaker BYD launches premium brand DENZA in Indonesia
articles.author: The Star
articles.summary: BYD launched its premium brand, DENZA, in Indonesia on Wednesday. This launch aims to expand BYD's presence in Indonesia's upscale automotive market.

articles.title: Don Toliver & J-Hope Preview 'LV Bag' Collab During LV Fashion Show
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Don Toliver and J-Hope previewed their new product or service.
